issue.title: hitting GUI reset button while paused should refresh the screen

content.raw:
currently, if one

1.  pause physics
1.  hit reset button (screen does not refresh, but object pose are actually reset already).
1.  unpause physics (things snap to their reset pose).

Ideally,

1.  pause physics
1.  hitting reset button should render objects as they are reset to the initial poses without having to unpause physics.
content.html:
currently, if one

  1. pause physics
  2. hit reset button (screen does not refresh, but object pose are actually reset already).
  3. unpause physics (things snap to their reset pose).

Ideally,

  1. pause physics
  2. hitting reset button should render objects as they are reset to the initial poses without having to unpause physics.
